Package com.omega.distributedsupport.coordinator

Interface Summary
CoordinatorEventListener Interface specifying event handling methods for an object listening for events from a Coordinator.
Elector Object that provides mechanism/algorithm for selection new master Coordinator object when one goes down.
 

Class Summary
Coordinator Class that provides support for failover/redundancy in clustered environments as well as central task coordination.
CoordinatorEventAdapter Event listener adapter that provides empty implementations for methods of CoordinatorEventListener.
CoordinatorMsg Object constituting message sent between coordinators via multicast.
CoordinatorPing Object containing data received in a ping message received from a Coordinator that is the master.
HighestHashElector Elector that determines the new master by comparing the hashes of all UUIDs, and returning the UUID that has the highest numerical hash.
 

Exception Summary
CoordinatorException Base exception thrown by Coordinators
